name: Lights Out (itch) (Diogo Vernier)
description:
Lights Out is a simple puzzle game, in which you have to turn off all the lights in as few button presses as possible.

This is my very first game, using Godot Engine, and I am making it for learning purposes.  I wanted to implement a simple game idea, in order to practice gamedev. While showering, I came up with this idea of a puzzle game involving lights, and switches. It turns out this game idea already existed haha: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lights_Out_(game)

This is just a prototype, and a test build. I would love suggestions on how to change the game mechanics a bit to make it more original. Let me know in the comments if you have any ideas. I will probably open source the game as well.

Surprisingly, I found the higher levels a bit challenging. I hope you enjoy playing it!
